summary: Tell the TEOF story with reusable assets and distribution rhythm

steps.title: Craft narrative arcs
steps.notes: Define 2–3 stories (alignment kernel, receipts-first automation, relay sprint case) mapped to target audiences.

steps.title: Produce core assets
steps.notes: Create a slide deck, one-pager, and short-form demo video referencing live receipts.

steps.title: Launch distribution cadence
steps.notes: Schedule newsletters/social posts and log outreach in `_report/usage/evangelism/`.

checkpoint.description: Narrative assets published with receipts; outreach cadence tracked for at least two cycles
